Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix renderer properties not being updated when hover/caretIndicator are null. When the hover/caretIndicator doesn't exist, we weren't invalidating the display list when the hover or caret indices changed even though the renderers may depend on those indices.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Before attempting to scroll, ensureCellIsVisible needs to make sure the layout cache isn't empty because it was recently cleared.  Add safeguard to prevent looping if the scroll position does not change after one iteration.
QE notes: 4 sort tests need updating because size/position of thumb changed slightly - currently excluded
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix double click event dispatching in Grid. Similar to fixing the click event, FP's double click doesn't account for the case where we might have display objects changing beneath so Grid should not listen for the FP's double click. Instead, we just check if the second click is within a certain time span.
Also, fix typo in SandboxMouseEvent and remove outdated TODO from FormLayout.
